name: GLADIATOR Train Runner Surfers
description:
The GLADIATOR final battle is here... but this time not in the arena!
Join them in the modern era, and help them survive to the modern life! Let the ancient Roman Empire prevail in modernity!!
Run with your Gladiator in an endless race and dodge all the oncoming trains while you beat all the scores.

ENHANCED GAMING FEATURES
- Unlimited powers!
- Various scenes
- Endless runner
- Hoverboard Surfing!
- Different Caesar's fighters
- Take the magnets to get all the coins
- Amazing 3D graphics

Help your gladiators to become more powerful than the Emperor of Rome!!!
Have fun!
